const openBluetoothAdapter = () => {
  uni.openBluetoothAdapter({
    success: res => {
      startBluetoothDevicesDiscovery(); // ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥æœå¯»è®¾å¤‡äº‹ä»¶
    },
    fail: res => {
      console.log(res);
      uni.showModal({
        title: 'æç¤º',
        content: 'è¯·å¼€å¯æœ¬æœºè“ç‰™åé‡è¿›æœ¬é¡µé¢'

  uni.startBluetoothDevicesDiscovery({
    allowDuplicatesKey: true, //å…è®¸é‡å¤ä¸ŠæŠ¥åŒä¸€ä¸ªè®¾å¤‡

      uni.showLoading({

è·å–è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡ #

  • uni.getBluetoothDevices è·å–åœ¨è“ç‰™æ¨¡å—ç”Ÿæ•ˆæœŸé—´æ‰€æœ‰å·²å‘ç°çš„è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡ã€‚æœ¬é¡¹ç›®çš„è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡å‡ä»¥ â€œTGYYâ€ å¼€å¤´ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤å‡ºè¿™äº›éœ€è¦çš„è®¾å¤‡æ¸²æŸ“åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸Šã€‚
  • è·å–æˆåŠŸå uni.stopBluetoothDevicesDiscovery å…³é—­è“ç‰™æœç´¢ã€‚
javascript
const getBluetoothDevices = () => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    uni.getBluetoothDevices({
      // æˆåŠŸæœç´¢åˆ°è®¾å¤‡åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œåœæ­¢æœç´¢
      success: res => {
        uni.stopBluetoothDevicesDiscovery({
          success(res) {
            console.log('åœæ­¢æœç´¢---', res);
          }
        });
        uni.hideLoading();
        // æ ¹æ®åç§°ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤å‡ºéŸ³æœçš„è®¾å¤‡
        list.value = res.devices.filter();
        isShow.value = true;
      },
      fail: err => {
        console.log(err);
        uni.stopBluetoothDevicesDiscovery({
          success(res) {
            console.log('åœæ­¢æœç´¢---', res);
          }
        });
        isShow.value = true;
      }
    });
  }, 2000);
};

è¿æ¥ä½åŠŸè€—è“ç‰™ #

uni.createBLEConnection(OBJECT) è¿æ¥ä½åŠŸè€—è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡ã€‚

å±æ€§ç±»å‹å¿…å¡«è¯´æ˜
deviceIdstringæ˜¯ç”¨äºåŒºåˆ†è®¾å¤‡çš„ id

è®¾å¤‡ id åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥è·å–è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡æ­¥éª¤ä¸­æˆåŠŸå›è°ƒé‡Œè·å–ã€‚æˆ‘ç»™æ¯æ¡æœç´¢åˆ°çš„è“ç‰™ç»“æœæ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ª click äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç›®æ ‡è®¾å¤‡å‘é€è¿æ¥è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè¿æ¥æˆåŠŸåå¯è·å–çŠ¶æ€å€¼ã€‚æµç¨‹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  1. è¿æ¥è®¾å¤‡ï¼šä½¿ç”¨è®¾å¤‡IDè¿›è¡Œè¿æ¥ uni.createBLEConnection
  2. è·å–è®¾å¤‡æ‰€æœ‰æœåŠ¡ï¼šä½¿ç”¨è®¾å¤‡IDè¿›è¡Œè¿æ¥ uni.getBLEDeviceServices
javascript
const handleBLEFn = item => {
  deviceId.value = item.deviceId;
  deviceName.value = item.name;
  uni.showLoading({
    title: 'æ­£åœ¨æŸ¥è¯¢æœåŠ¡',
    duration: 3000
  });
  uni.createBLEConnection({
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„ deviceId éœ€è¦å·²ç»é€šè¿‡ createBLEConnection ä¸å¯¹åº”è®¾å¤‡å»ºç«‹é“¾æ¥
    deviceId: item.deviceId,
    success(res) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        // è·å–è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡æ‰€æœ‰æœåŠ¡(service)ã€‚
        uni.getBLEDeviceServices({
          deviceId: item.deviceId,
          success(res) {
            console.log('device services:', res.services);
            uni.hideLoading();
            if (res.services.length === 0) {
              uni.showToast({
                title: 'æš‚æ— æœåŠ¡',
                icon: 'none'
              });
              return;
            }
            searchList.value = res.services;
            isSearch.value = false;
            handleBLEDeviceFn(res.services[1]) // ç¬¬äº”æ­¥è·å–è®¾å¤‡ç‰¹å¾å€¼äº‹ä»¶
          },
          fail(err) {
            console.log(err);
            getErrInfo(err.code);
            uni.hideLoading();
          }
        });
      }, 2500);
    },
    fail(err) {
      console.log(err);
      getErrInfo(err.code);
      uni.hideLoading();
    }
  });
};

è·å–è®¾å¤‡ç‰¹å¾å€¼ï¼Œå¼€å¯æ¶ˆæ¯ç›‘å¬å¹¶æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯ç›‘å¬ä¼ æ¥çš„æ•°æ® #

é€šè¿‡è·å–åˆ°çš„è®¾å¤‡IDå’Œè“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡æœåŠ¡æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬äºŒé¡¹å…ƒç´  uuid å»è·å–è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡æŸä¸ªæœåŠ¡ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰ç‰¹å¾å€¼ã€‚

  1. å…è®¸è¯»ï¼šè°ƒç”¨ uni.readBLECharacteristicValue äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬
  2. å…è®¸å†™ï¼šä¿å­˜å…¶ uuid åç»­åšå†™çš„æ“ä½œ
  3. å…è®¸ç›‘å¬ï¼šè°ƒç”¨ uni.notifyBLECharacteristicValueChange äº‹ä»¶å¼€å¯ç›‘å¬ï¼Œå†é€šè¿‡ uni.onBLECharacteristicValueChange ç›‘å¬å…¶å˜åŒ–ã€‚
javascript
const handleBLEDeviceFn = uuid => {
  uni.showLoading({
    title: 'æ­£åœ¨è·å–ç‰¹å¾å€¼',
    duration: 3000
  });
  uni.getBLEDeviceCharacteristics({
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„ deviceId éœ€è¦å·²ç»é€šè¿‡ createBLEConnection ä¸å¯¹åº”è®¾å¤‡å»ºç«‹é“¾æ¥
    deviceId,
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„ serviceId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBLEDeviceServices æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
    serviceId,
    success(res) {
      console.log('device getBLEDeviceCharacteristics:', res.characteristics);
      uni.hideLoading();
      getUUidList.value = true;
      for (let i = 0; i < res.characteristics.length; i++) {
        let item = res.characteristics[i];
        if (item.properties.read) {
          // å…è®¸è¯»
          uni.readBLECharacteristicValue({
            deviceId: deviceId.value,
            serviceId: uuid.uuid,
            characteristicId: item.uuid,
            success(res) {
              console.log('è¯»å–æŒ‡ä»¤å‘é€èƒœåˆ©', res);
            },
            fail(err) {
              console.log('è¯»å–æŒ‡ä»¤å‘é€å¤±è´¥', err);
            }
          });
        }
        if (item.properties.write) {
          // å…è®¸å†™
          characteristicId.value = item.uuid;
        }
        if (item.properties.notify || item.properties.indicate) {
          // è¦å¼€å¯è¿™ä¸ªæ‰èƒ½ç›‘å¬
          uni.notifyBLECharacteristicValueChange({
            deviceId,
            serviceId,
            characteristicId: item.uuid,
            state: true,
            success(res) {
              uni.showLoading({
                title: 'è¿æ¥ä¸­',
                duration: 3000
              });
              console.log('notifyBLECharacteristicValueChange success:', JSON.stringify(res));
              // ç›‘å¬ä½åŠŸè€—è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼å˜åŒ–äº‹ä»¶æˆåŠŸ
              uni.onBLECharacteristicValueChange(characteristic => {
                var array = new Uint8Array(characteristic.value);
                console.log('åŒ…' + array);
                let resHex = ab2hex(characteristic.value);
                console.log(resHex);
              });
              setTimeout(() => {
                uni.hideLoading();
              }, 3000);
            },
            fail(err) {
              console.log(err);
              getErrInfo(err.code);
              uni.hideLoading();
            }
          });
        }
      }
    },
    fail(err) {
      console.log(err);
      getErrInfo(err.code);
      uni.hideLoading();
    }
  });
};

å¿…é¡»å…ˆå¯ç”¨Â notifyBLECharacteristicValueChangeÂ æ‰èƒ½ç›‘å¬åˆ°è®¾å¤‡Â characteristicValueChangeÂ äº‹ä»¶ã€‚

            "indicate": false

å†™å…¥æ•°æ® #

æ•°æ®çš„å†™å…¥éœ€è¦è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡å‚å•†æä¾›å¯¹åº”çš„åå…­è¿›åˆ¶æŒ‡ä»¤ã€‚

  1. å£°æ˜ä¸€ä¸ª ArrayBuffer 16è¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®
  2. é€šè¿‡ DataView è¿½åŠ æ•°æ®
  3. é€šè¿‡ uni.writeBLECharacteristicValue å‘ä½åŠŸè€—è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡ç‰¹å¾å€¼ä¸­å†™å…¥äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®ã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼šå¿…é¡»è®¾å¤‡çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼æ”¯æŒ write æ‰å¯ä»¥æˆåŠŸè°ƒç”¨ã€‚
javascript
const handleClick = (str) => {
  // å‘è“ç‰™è®¾æ–½å‘é€ä¸€ä¸ª0x00çš„16è¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®
  const buffer = new ArrayBuffer(16);
  const dataView = new DataView(buffer);
  const arr = str.split(' ')
  for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    dataView.setUint8(i, parseInt(arr[i], 16))
  }
  uni.writeBLECharacteristicValue({
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„ deviceId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBluetoothDevices æˆ– onBluetoothDeviceFound æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
    deviceId,
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„ serviceId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBLEDeviceServices æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
    serviceId,
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„ characteristicId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBLEDeviceCharacteristics æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
    characteristicId,
    // è¿™é‡Œçš„valueæ˜¯ArrayBufferç±»å‹
    value: buffer,
    writeType: 'write',
    success(res) {
      console.log('writeBLECharacteristicValue success', res);
    },
    fail(err) {
      getErrInfo(err.code);
      console.log('writeBLECharacteristicValue error', err);
    }
  });
};

ArrayBuffer #

ArrayBuffer å¯¹è±¡ä»£è¡¨å‚¨å­˜äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®çš„ä¸€æ®µå†…å­˜ï¼Œä¸€ç»åˆ›å»ºå°±ä¸èƒ½å†è°ƒæ•´å¤§å°ã€‚

javascript
const buf = new ArrayBuffer(16);   // åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­åˆ†é…16 å­—èŠ‚
alert(buf.byteLength);               // 16

å®ƒä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è¯»å†™ï¼Œåªèƒ½é€šè¿‡è§†å›¾ï¼ˆTypedArray è§†å›¾å’Œ DataView è§†å›¾)æ¥è¯»å†™ã€‚è§†å›¾çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šæ ¼å¼è§£è¯»äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®ã€‚DataView è§†å›¾çš„åˆ›å»ºï¼Œéœ€è¦æä¾› ArrayBuffer å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ã€‚

const buf = new ArrayBuffer(32);
const dataView = new DataView(buf);
dataView.getUint8(0) // 0, å‚æ•°è¡¨ç¤ºè¯»å–çš„èµ·å§‹ä½ç½®

DataView #

JavaScript ä¸­çš„ DataView å‡½æ•°æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†å¤šä¸ªæ•°å­—ç±»å‹è¯»å†™åˆ° ArrayBuffer ä¸­ã€‚å¥æ³•ï¼š

javascript
new DataView(buffer, byteOffset, byteLength)

**å‚æ•°ï¼š**è¯¥å‡½æ•°æ¥å—ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€è¿°ï¼š

  • **bufferï¼š**ä¸€ä¸ªå·²ç»å­˜åœ¨çš„ ArrayBufferï¼Œç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æ–°çš„DataViewå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
  • **byteOffset (optional)ï¼š**ç¼“å†²åŒºä¸­çš„offset(ä»¥å­—èŠ‚ä¸ºå•ä½)ç”¨äºå¯åŠ¨ç¼“å†²åŒºçš„æ–°è§†å›¾ã€‚é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæ–°è§†å›¾ä»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚å¼€å§‹ã€‚
  • **byteLength (optional)ï¼š**å®ƒä»£è¡¨å­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ æ•°ã€‚é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œç¼“å†²åŒºçš„é•¿åº¦è¢«è§†ä¸ºè§†å›¾çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚

**è¿”å›å€¼ï¼š**å®ƒè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„DataViewå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå®ƒå°†ä»£è¡¨æŒ‡å®šçš„æ•°æ®ç¼“å†²åŒºã€‚

<script setup>

		ref

	const deviceId = ref('');

	// é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
	const getErrInfo = err => {
		switch (err) {
			case 10000:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'æœªåˆå§‹åŒ–è“ç‰™é€‚é…å™¨',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10001:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'å½“å‰è“ç‰™é€‚é…å™¨ä¸å¯ç”¨',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10002:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°æŒ‡å®šè®¾å¤‡',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10003:

					title: 'è¿æ¥å¤±è´¥',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10004:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°æŒ‡å®šæœåŠ¡',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10005:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°æŒ‡å®šç‰¹å¾å€¼',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10006:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'å½“å‰è¿æ¥å·²æ–­å¼€',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10007:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'å½“å‰ç‰¹å¾å€¼ä¸æ”¯æŒæ­¤æ“ä½œ',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10009:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'ç³»ç»Ÿç‰ˆæœ¬ä½äº 4.3 ä¸æ”¯æŒ BLE',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10010:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'å·²è¿æ¥',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			case 10011:
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'é…å¯¹è®¾å¤‡éœ€è¦é…å¯¹ç ',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;

					title: 'è¿æ¥è¶…æ—¶',
					icon: 'none'

					title: 'è¿æ¥ deviceId ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–è€…æ˜¯æ ¼å¼ä¸æ­£ç¡®',
					icon: 'none'
				});
				break;
			default:
				break;
		}
	};

	// å¼€å¯è“ç‰™
	const openBluetoothAdapter = () => {
		uni.openBluetoothAdapter({
			success: res => {
				startBluetoothDevicesDiscovery();
			},
			fail: res => {
				console.log(res);
				uni.showModal({
					title: 'æç¤º',
					content: 'è¯·å¼€å¯æœ¬æœºè“ç‰™åé‡è¿›æœ¬é¡µé¢'
				});
			}
		});
	};

	// å¼€å¯è“ç‰™æœç´¢
	const startBluetoothDevicesDiscovery = () => {
		uni.startBluetoothDevicesDiscovery({
			allowDuplicatesKey: true, //å…è®¸é‡å¤ä¸ŠæŠ¥åŒä¸€ä¸ªè®¾å¤‡
			success: res => {
				uni.showLoading({
					title: 'æ­£åœ¨æœç´¢è®¾å¤‡',
					duration: 2000
				});
				getBluetoothDevices(); //ç›‘å¬æ–°è®¾å¤‡äº‹ä»¶
			},
			fail: err => {
				console.log(err);
			}
		});
	};

	const list = ref([]);
	const isShow = ref(false);
	const deviceName = ref('')

	// è“ç‰™æœç´¢ç»“æœ
	const getBluetoothDevices = () => {
		setTimeout(() => {
			uni.getBluetoothDevices({
				success: res => {
					uni.stopBluetoothDevicesDiscovery({
						success(res) {
							console.log('åœæ­¢æœç´¢---', res);
						}
					});
					uni.hideLoading();
					// è¿‡æ»¤å‡ºéŸ³æœçš„è®¾å¤‡
					list.value = res.devices.filter(item => item.localName.indexOf('TGYY') !== -1);
					isShow.value = true;
				},
				fail: err => {
					console.log(err);
					uni.stopBluetoothDevicesDiscovery({
						success(res) {
							console.log('åœæ­¢æœç´¢---', res);
						}
					});
					isShow.value = true;
				}
			});
		}, 2000);
	};

	// ç‚¹å‡»è“ç‰™è·å–æœåŠ¡
	const isSearch = ref(true);
	const searchList = ref([]);
	const handleBLEFn = item => {
		deviceId.value = item.deviceId;
		deviceName.value = item.name;
		uni.showLoading({
			title: 'æ­£åœ¨æŸ¥è¯¢æœåŠ¡',
			duration: 3000
		});
		uni.createBLEConnection({
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„ deviceId éœ€è¦å·²ç»é€šè¿‡ createBLEConnection ä¸å¯¹åº”è®¾å¤‡å»ºç«‹é“¾æ¥
			deviceId: item.deviceId,
			success(res) {
				setTimeout(() => {
					// è·å–è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡æ‰€æœ‰æœåŠ¡(service)ã€‚
					uni.getBLEDeviceServices({
						deviceId: item.deviceId,
						success(res) {
							console.log('device services:', res.services);
							uni.hideLoading();
							if (res.services.length === 0) {
								uni.showToast({
									title: 'æš‚æ— æœåŠ¡',
									icon: 'none'
								});
								return;
							}
							searchList.value = res.services;
							isSearch.value = false;
							handleBLEDeviceFn(res.services[1])
						},
						fail(err) {
							console.log(err);
							getErrInfo(err.code);
							uni.hideLoading();
						}
					});
				}, 2500);
			},
			fail(err) {
				console.log(err);
				getErrInfo(err.code);
				uni.hideLoading();
			}
		});
	};

	// è·å–è“ç‰™çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼
	const getUUidList = ref(false);
	const uuidList = ref([]);
	const uuidStr = ref('');
	const characteristicId = ref('');
	const blueType = ref('') // è“ç‰™å¼€å¯çŠ¶æ€
	const blueMove = ref(null) // è“ç‰™æŒ¡ä½
	const content = ref('') // æ¨¡æ€æ¡†çš„å†…å®¹
	const showModal = ref(false) // æ¨¡æ€æ¡†çš„æ˜¾éš
	const handleBLEDeviceFn = uuid => {
		uni.showLoading({
			title: 'æ­£åœ¨è·å–ç‰¹å¾å€¼',
			duration: 3000
		});
		uuidStr.value = uuid.uuid;
		uni.getBLEDeviceCharacteristics({
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„ deviceId éœ€è¦å·²ç»é€šè¿‡ createBLEConnection ä¸å¯¹åº”è®¾å¤‡å»ºç«‹é“¾æ¥
			deviceId: deviceId.value,
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„ serviceId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBLEDeviceServices æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
			serviceId: uuid.uuid,
			success(res) {
				console.log('device getBLEDeviceCharacteristics:', res.characteristics);
				uni.hideLoading();
				getUUidList.value = true;
				for (let i = 0; i < res.characteristics.length; i++) {
					let item = res.characteristics[i];
					if (item.properties.read) {
						// å…è®¸è¯»
						uni.readBLECharacteristicValue({
							deviceId: deviceId.value,
							serviceId: uuid.uuid,
							characteristicId: item.uuid,
							success(res) {
								console.log('è¯»å–æŒ‡ä»¤å‘é€èƒœåˆ©', res);
							},
							fail(err) {
								console.log('è¯»å–æŒ‡ä»¤å‘é€å¤±è´¥', err);
							}
						});
					}
					if (item.properties.write) {
						// å…è®¸å†™
						characteristicId.value = item.uuid;
					}
					if (item.properties.notify || item.properties.indicate) {
						// è¦å¼€å¯è¿™ä¸ªæ‰èƒ½ç›‘å¬
						uni.notifyBLECharacteristicValueChange({
							deviceId: deviceId.value,
							serviceId: uuid.uuid,
							characteristicId: item.uuid,
							state: true,
							success(res) {
								uni.showLoading({
									title: 'è¿æ¥ä¸­',
									duration: 3000
								});
								setTimeout(() => {
									handleClick('55 AA 04 AA 00 00 A5 5A')
								}, 1500)
								// ç›‘å¬ä½åŠŸè€—è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼å˜åŒ–äº‹ä»¶æˆåŠŸ
								uni.onBLECharacteristicValueChange(characteristic => {
									var array = new Uint8Array(characteristic.value);
									console.log('åŒ…' + array);
									let resHex = ab2hex(characteristic.value);
									console.log(resHex);
									if (resHex.length >= 25) {
										blueType.value = resHex.slice(8, 10) === '01' ? 'å¼€' :
											'å…³'
										blueMove.value = parseInt(resHex.slice(14, 16), 16)
										content.value =
											`å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ï¼š${blueType.value}ï¼›å½“å‰æ¡£ä½ï¼š${blueMove.value}`
										showModal.value = true
									}
									uni.hideLoading();
								});
								setTimeout(() => {
									uni.hideLoading();
								}, 3000);
							},
							fail(err) {
								console.log(err);
								getErrInfo(err.code);
								uni.hideLoading();
							}
						});
					}
				}
			},
			fail(err) {
				console.log(err);
				getErrInfo(err.code);
				uni.hideLoading();
			}
		});
	};

	const handleClick = (str) => {
		// å‘è“ç‰™è®¾æ–½å‘é€ä¸€ä¸ª0x00çš„16è¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®
		const buffer = new ArrayBuffer(16);
		const dataView = new DataView(buffer);
		const arr = str.split(' ')
		for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
			dataView.setUint8(i, parseInt(arr[i], 16))
		}
		uni.showLoading({
			title: 'ä¼ è¾“åè®®ä¸­',
			duration: 1000
		});
		uni.writeBLECharacteristicValue({
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„ deviceId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBluetoothDevices æˆ– onBluetoothDeviceFound æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
			deviceId: deviceId.value,
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„ serviceId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBLEDeviceServices æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
			serviceId: uuidStr.value,
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„ characteristicId éœ€è¦åœ¨ getBLEDeviceCharacteristics æ¥å£ä¸­è·å–
			characteristicId: characteristicId.value,
			// è¿™é‡Œçš„valueæ˜¯ArrayBufferç±»å‹
			value: buffer,
			writeType: 'write',
			success(res) {
				console.log('writeBLECharacteristicValue success', res);
			},
			fail(err) {
				getErrInfo(err.code);
				console.log('writeBLECharacteristicValue error', err);
			}
		});
	};

	// ArrayBufferè½¬16è¿›åº¦å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç¤ºä¾‹
	const ab2hex = buffer => {
		const hexArr = Array.prototype.map.call(
			new Uint8Array(buffer),
			function(bit) {
				return ('00' + bit.toString(16)).slice(-2)
			}
		)
		return hexArr.join('')
	};

	onLoad(() => {
		openBluetoothAdapter();
	});

	// æ”¹å˜æŒ¡ä½
	const moveVal = ref('')
	const handleClickChangeMove = type => {
		console.log(type)
		switch (type) {
			case 'add':
				if (blueMove.value >= 20) {
					showModal.value = true
					content.value = 'å½“å‰æ¡£ä½å·²ç»æ˜¯æœ€å¤§å€¼'
					return
				}
				blueMove.value += 1
				break;
			case 'lose':
				if (blueMove.value <= 0) {
					showModal.value = true
					content.value = 'å½“å‰æ¡£ä½å·²ç»æ˜¯æœ€å°å€¼'
					return
				}
				blueMove.value -= 1
				break;
			default:
				break;
		}
		console.log(blueMove.value)
		handleClick(`55 AA 04 A3 00 ${blueMove.value.toString(16)} A5 5A`)
	}
	
	const handlePageFn = () => {
		uni.closeBluetoothAdapter({
			success(res) {
				uni.navigateBack()
				uni.showToast({
					title: 'è“ç‰™æœç´¢å…³é—­'
				})
			}
		});
	}
</script>

<template>
	<u-modal v-model="showModal" :content="content"></u-modal>
	<!-- æœç´¢çŠ¶æ€ -->
	<view v-if="list.length > 0" class="list">
		<template v-if="isSearch">
			<view v-for="item in list" :key="item.deviceId" class="blue-item" @click="handleBLEFn(item)">
				<view class="phone">
					<view>è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡</view>
					<view>{{ item.deviceId }}</view>
				</view>
				<view class="name">
					<view>è“ç‰™åç§°</view>
					<view>{{ item.name ? item.name : 'æš‚æ— ' }}</view>
				</view>
			</view>
		</template>

		<!-- ç‚¹å‡»è“ç‰™è¿›å…¥å…¶å€¼ -->
		<template v-else>
			<template v-if="getUUidList">
				<view class="close-page" @click="handlePageFn">å…³é—­é¡µé¢å¹¶å…³é—­è“ç‰™æœç´¢</view>
				
				<view class="blue-item">
					<view class="phone">
						<view>è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡</view>
						<view>{{ deviceId }}</view>
					</view>
					<view class="name">
						<view>è“ç‰™åç§°</view>
						<view>{{ deviceName ? deviceName : 'æš‚æ— ' }}</view>
					</view>
				</view>
				
				<view class="blue-item">
					<view>
						<view>å½“å‰æ¡£ä½ï¼š</view>
						<view>{{blueMove}}</view>
					</view>
				</view>

				<view class="get-uuid-list">
					<view class="item-list">
						<view class="get-uuid-item" @click="handleClick('55 AA 04 A0 00 01 A5 5A')">
							<i class="iconfont icon-kaiguan"></i>
							<view class="name">å¼€</view>
						</view>
						<view class="get-uuid-item" @click="handleClick('55 AA 04 A0 00 00 A5 5A')">
							<i class="iconfont icon-kaiguan"></i>
							<view class="name">å…³</view>
						</view>
					</view>
				
					<view class="item-list">
						<view class="get-uuid-item" @click="handleClick('55 AA 04 AA 00 00 A5 5A')">
							<u-icon name="search"></u-icon>
							<view class="name">æŸ¥è¯¢</view>
						</view>
					</view>
				
					<view class="item-list">
						<view class="get-uuid-item" @click="handleClickChangeMove('add')">
							<i class="iconfont icon-jia"></i>
							<view class="name">æ¡£ä½+</view>
						</view>
						<view class="get-uuid-item" @click="handleClickChangeMove('lose')">
							<i class="iconfont icon-jian"></i>
							<view class="name">æ¡£ä½-</view>
						</view>
					</view>
				</view>
			</template>
		</template>
	</view>
	<view v-else>
		<view v-if="isShow" class="no-blue-teeth">
			<u-empty text="æš‚æ— å¯è¿æ¥è“ç‰™" mode="wifi"></u-empty>
			<view class="info">
				<view>æç¤ºï¼š</view>
				<view>1.è¯·ç¡®ä¿ä½ å¼€å¯äº†è“ç‰™å’Œå®šä½</view>
				<view>2.è¯·ç¡®ä¿ä½ é™„è¿‘æœ‰éŸ³æœç³»åˆ—çš„è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡</view>
				<view>3.è¯·ç¡®ä¿ä½ è¦è¿æ¥çš„è“ç‰™è®¾å¤‡æ²¡è¢«å…¶ä»–äººè¿æ¥</view>
			</view>
		</view>
	</view>
</template>

æ‰«ä¸€æ‰« #

æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€è¿”å›å€¼å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

javascript
{
 "scanType": "QR_CODE",
 "path": "/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/io.dcloud.HBuilder/apps/HBuilder/doc/uniapp_temp/compressed/1672372115339_Screenshot_2022-12-16-05-50-02-044_com.tencent.mm.jpg",
 "charSet": "UTF-8",
 "result": "{\"label\":\"yss\",\"cid\":\"440************015\",\"cidtype\":\"1000\",\"name\":\"æœ**\",\"phone\":\"188******29\",\"encode\":\"l49BgRYoHgYOjGVJo6TxZmha70+LSFrnJ2UpZRuroDbgr/hmzGLsoLQhyE1TmBkm\",\"c\":\"G\",\"t\":1671140993,\"v\":3,\"s\":\"r4us4uH/T+LO2AJClsso/MvZs3YOP4h47rm5RyxvBVkrwudliJNjFBhevkcUKPVB1HWXILwxXIpnT59PUQa1FA==\"}",
 "errMsg": "scanCode:ok"
}

å¯¹è±¡å†…çš„Â resultÂ åŒ…å«äºŒç»´ç çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªÂ JSONÂ æ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚

javascript
const scanCodeFn = () => {
  uni.scanCode({
    scanType: ['qrCode'], //æ¡å½¢ç 
    success: function(res) {
      if (res.errMsg == "scanCode:ok") {
        let result = res.result
        // æ‰«ç æˆåŠŸåè‡ªå·±çš„ä¸šåŠ¡æ“ä½œ
      } else {
        uni.showToast({
          title: 'æœªè¯†åˆ«åˆ°äºŒç»´ç ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°å°è¯•ï¼',
          icon: 'none'
        })
      }
    }
  })
}
